attributes.title: Kumbh Chalo, Taste the Freedom Lifestyle
attributes.description:
Kumbh Chalo (Lets go to Kumbh) is the essence of today's satsang (28th August 2015) by Paramahamsa Nithyananda, who invites all to the upcoming Kumbh Mela at Nasik (Sept 11-20 2015). 

(Join the sacred Journey with Paramahamsa Nithyananda
events/kumbh-mela-nasik-10-day-program )

Kumbh is such a joy and excitement. All religions have these three - spiritual tourism, scriptures and celebration. All the three happening together is Kumbh Mela. Nornally in society, the togetherness, we have to compromise on â€“ what we think as freedom, how we want to be. Deciding to be free from the compromising lifestyle and tasting the real Sannyas for 10 days is Kumbh Mela. He emphasised that Kumbh is not some anti-social freedom, it is actually the free being celebrating freedom. Nagas, Sadhus express the peak of their mystic powers. "Kumbh is the experience of liberation to the dimension of celebration. Don't miss such a large group consciousness and group energy.
